utl001.name: Jump Thrusters
utl001.description: Grants a temporary speed boost and allows short-distance movement ignoring terrain.

utl002.name: Vector Stabilizers
utl002.description: Increases turn speed and reduces movement penalties on rough terrain.

utl003.name: Advanced Servo Motors
utl003.description: Passively increases movement speed by a small amount.

utl004.name: Reactive Plating
utl004.description: Passively increases armor durability, improving survivability in prolonged engagements.

utl005.name: Shield Booster
utl005.description: Temporarily boosts shield capacity beyond its maximum limit.

utl006.name: Energy Dissipator
utl006.description: Reduces incoming energy-based damage by dispersing excess charge.

utl007.name: Kinetic Dampeners
utl007.description: Absorbs and distributes kinetic force, reducing impact damage.

utl008.name: Blast Diffuser
utl008.description: Specialized plating disperses explosive force, reducing area damage effects.

utl009.name: Fortified Core
utl009.description: Reinforces internal structure, increasing overall health capacity.

utl010.name: Damage Control Unit
utl010.description: An automated system that repairs minor structural damage in emergencies.

utl011.name: Plasma Deflector
utl011.description: Advanced shielding minimizes the impact of plasma-based attacks.

utl012.name: Corrosion Neutralizer
utl012.description: A specialized coating reduces the effectiveness of corrosive attacks.

utl013.name: Multi-Layered Shielding
utl013.description: An advanced defensive system that provides moderate resistance against all damage types by distributing energy absorption across multiple protective layers.

utl014.name: Targeting Computer
utl014.description: A precision-targeting system that enhances weapon accuracy.

utl015.name: Advanced Optics
utl015.description: High-resolution targeting optics that extend weapon range.

utl016.name: Sensor Disruptor
utl016.description: Jams enemy targeting systems, reducing their accuracy.

utl017.name: Power Capacitor
utl017.description: Stores excess energy and releases it when needed for an instant power surge.

utl018.name: Cooldown Optimizer
utl018.description: Advanced system reduces cooldown times of all equipped modules.

utl019.name: Overdrive Core
utl019.description: Temporarily boosts all combat stats at the cost of disabling shields.
